dct_title_s: Preliminary map of Mount Everest : constructed at the R. G. S. from photographs and sketches made by the expedition of 1921
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Routes of expedition and locations of panoram camera stations shown in red. Major glaciers are labeled. From: Geographical Journal. Vol. 59, no. 2 (Feb. 1922), pp. 81-112, 131-137; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J6874
dct_subject_sm: Everest, Mount (China and Nepal)—Description and travel
dcat_theme_sm: Everest, Mount (China and Nepal)—Description and travel
